column2: Blackrock Science and Technology Trust II

BlackRock Science and Technology Trust II, formerly Blackrock Science & Technology Trust Ii, is a non-diversified, closed-end equity fund. The Company’s investment objectives of providing total return and income through a combination of income, gains and long-term capital appreciation. The Trust invest at least 80% of its total assets in equity securities issued by United States and non-United States science and technology companies in any market capitalization range. BlackRock Advisors, LLC is the Trust’s investment adviser.
